metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36310 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.arch/x86/kvm/svm/svm.c allows a set_memory_region_test infinite loop forcertain nested page faults, aka CID-e72436bc3a52.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
